meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>religion</kanji> <kanji>sect</kanji> is a sect within religion, most likely, but it can be simply referred to as a <vocabulary>sect</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>denomination</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
